ADDENDUM 
Subject : Operation of Lounge in SHA of airports 
Reference :  AVSEC Order No. 01/2007 dated 29/3/2007. 
 
 
The following text is inserted as Para 2 (viii) (a) in the above mentioned AVSEC 
Order:- 
“ In this context, the lounges run by airline operator/airport operators in 
SHA will not be treated as sub-contracting and would be allowed to operate so 
long as airport operator/airline operator and the lounge operator are security 
cleared and their employees are security vetted.” 
 
This issues with the approval of Commissioner of Security (CA)
